Question
========
  
What conclusion may you draw if a hypothesis test shows that the effect of an intervention is statistically significant?


Answerlist
----------
* The intervention has effect.
* The intervention has effect with 95% certainty.
* It is unlikely that the intervention has no effect.
* Answers a, b and c are correct.
